message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
You started high, I'll try to balance it out!
You can't have all the fun, Bob! I'm making a counteroffer!
You're getting greedy, Alice! Let's meet in the middle!
You're getting closer, Bob! But I'm still not ready to give in!
Getting close, but I'm not giving up yet! Meet me in the middle, but a little more towards me this time!
I'm not giving up, Bob! I'll meet you in the middle, but just a little bit more towards me!
